req-1.description: Must be a Private Route, accessible only to logged-in users.

req-2.description: Form Fields: Food Name, Food Image (imgbb), Food Quantity, Pickup Location, Expire Date, Additional Notes.

req-3.description: Auto-filled Data: Donator's Info (Name, Email, Image) must be automatically added from the logged-in Firebase user.

req-4.description: Default Status: The 'food_status' must be set to 'Available' by default on creation.

req-5.description: On submission, save data to MongoDB 'foods' collection and show a success toast.

req-1.description: Fetch and display all food items where 'food_status' is 'Available'.

req-2.description: Card Layout: Display foods in a grid. Each card must show: Food Image, Name, Donator Name & Image, Quantity, Location, Expire Date.

req-3.description: 'View Details' button must redirect non-logged-in users to the Login page.

req-1.description: Must be a Private, dynamic route (e.g., /food/:id).

req-2.description: Display all details for the selected item, including Donator Info and Additional Notes.

req-3.description: A 'Request Food' button must be present on this page.

req-1.description: Private Route: Must show *only* the foods added by the currently logged-in user.

req-2.description: Update Functionality: An 'Update' button must be present for each item (opening a Modal or new Page).

req-3.description: Pre-filled Form: The Update form must be pre-filled with the existing data for that food item.

req-4.description: Delete Functionality: A 'Delete' button must be present, showing a confirmation prompt (e.g., SweetAlert) before deletion.
